message: Let's split it evenly. It's fair and simple.
You're not getting the better deal this time!
I propose we go back to a more equitable distribution. I take 70% and you take 30%. It's still fair considering the previous offers.
You're getting a bit too greedy, don't you think?
I believe a 60-40 split would be reasonable. It's fair and acknowledges the value of our partnership.
